function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of control group in previous study","Impact":"Inability to compare the effect of exergames to other conditions","Mitigation":"Include a designated control group in future studies to assess the true impact of exergames","Technologies":"Not applicable","People":"Researchers, scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of examination of physiological and psychological mechanisms","Impact":"Unclear understanding of how exergames reduce anxiety levels","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies to investigate the mechanisms responsible for reducing anxiety during exergame sessions","Technologies":"Not applicable","People":"Researchers, scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Inability to identify chronic effects of exergames","Impact":"Limited understanding of the long-term impact of exergame sessions on anxiety levels","Mitigation":"Conduct longitudinal studies to assess the chronic effects of moderate intensity exergames on anxiety","Technologies":"Not applicable","People":"Researchers, scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, funding organizations"}]}
